name: Cinnamon Bun French Toast 🥗
description: Swoon over the sweet, swirled embrace of cinnamon bun French toast, where the allure of cinnamon and sugar meets the custard-soaked tenderness of a breakfast classic. Each heavenly bite will have you floating on a cloud of morning bliss.
instructions: In a large bowl, whisk together the eggs, milk, vanilla, and cinnamon.
Melt the butter in a large skillet over medium-low heat.
Dunk 2 slices of bread at a time in the egg mixture.
In medium bowl mix cream cheese, heavy cream, powdered sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg and vanilla.
Stack and drizzle with cream cheese mixture.
